name: HelpClose
description: This plugin defines a new little command :HelpAllClose.  When execute this command, all help windows are closed.  You doesn't need to move to help window, when want to close it, any more.
install_details:
Put the file at one of your plugin directories.
  ex. $HOME/.vim/plugin/
  ex. $HOME\vimfiles\plugin\
  ex. $VIM\vimfiles\plugin\
